<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update workspace participant role"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/admin/workspaces/{workspaceId}/participants/{participantId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the role of the given workspace participant.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workspaceId","in":"path","description":"Workspace numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},{"name":"participantId","in":"path","description":"Participant numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Participant update request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","enum":["owner","admin","maintain","launch","connect","view"],"title":"WspRole"}},"title":"UpdateParticipantRoleRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"},"204":{"description":"AdminUpdateWorkspaceParticipantRole 204 response"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
